overview:
Noam Rubinstein is a New York area technology professional with career experience in video games and web and a background finance and accounting.

He is currently an independent consultant working with New York-area startups, and was most recently Product Manager at Kapitall, an award winning online Broker-Dealer.

Prior to Kapitall, Noam has had roles as an Associate at PricewaterhouseCoopers and as a Producer/Product Manager on a range of interactive entertainment and educational titles and technology projects.

Noam occasionally guest lectures at the City University of New York, Brooklyn College, in the Department of Finance & Business Management. Noam is a Golden Key International Honor Society member and has been featured in New York Magazine (June 30 2009). He is an Associate Member of the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants and a member of the New York State Society of Certified Public Accountants.
